programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. The Challenger Disaster - Pressing launch schedules lead to carelessness and the loss of the Challenger. Return to Space - A re-designed shuttle is back in space with a redefined role.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Machines, S01E02, WOTAN has put in motion its plan to dominate the world and has ordered its human subjects to construct the deadly War Machines in secret locations.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Machines, S01E03, With WOTAN’s plans for world conquest about to reach fruition, the Doctor comes face-to-face with the unstoppable might of the War Machines.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The War Machines, S01E04, The Doctor hatches a dangerous plan to capture a war machine and turn WOTAN’s creations against it.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Power of the Daleks, S01E01, Ben and Polly suspect that the 'new' Doctor is really an imposter. The TARDIS lands on the planet Vulcan where a murder has been committed.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Power of the Daleks, S01E02, Posing as an Examiner from Earth, the Doctor warns the scientist Lesterson of the dire consequences of reactivating the dormant Daleks.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Power of the Daleks, S01E03, Polly is taken prisoner by the rebels who intend to use the Daleks to take control of the colony. The Doctor discovers that all three Daleks have now been reactivated.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Power of the Daleks, S01E04, Lesterson is driven insane when he discovers that the Daleks are reproducing themselves and are preparing to seize control of the colony.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Power of the Daleks, S01E05, Bragen leads the rebellion and takes control of the colony, killing Governor Hensell. But the Daleks are also ready to make their final move.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Power of the Daleks, S01E06, As battle rages between the rebels and the loyal colonists, the Daleks begin their attack. The only chance of survival for the colony rests with the Doctor.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Tomb of the Cybermen, S02E01, The Doctor discovers archaeologists trying to find the lost tombs of the Cybermen.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Tomb of the Cybermen, S02E02, The Doctor and archaeologists discover the city of Telos isn't as dead as they assumed.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Tomb of the Cybermen, S02E03, Trapped in the tombs, the Cybermen release their poisonous pets, Cybermats.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Tomb of the Cybermen, S02E04, How will the Doctor rid Telos of Cybermen once and for all?
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death, S01E01, The TARDIS arrives on 21st Century Earth where all long-distance journeys are made instantaneously by T-Mat. But aliens have invaded the T-Mat relay station on the Moon...
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death, S01E02, With the commerce of the world grinding to a halt, the Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe agree to investigate and set off for the Moon in an old fashioned rocket.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: Death of a Hero
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E04, A fire in January 2007 claims the life of WWII vet Bennie Angelo. A closer look at the crime scene reveals Bennie was dead before the fire, bumping an arson case up to homicide.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E14, It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E1012, A district attorney uses a clever technique--a "John Doe indictment"--to give law enforcement officials the time they need to track down the Schoolgirl Rapist from Rochester, N. Y.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.
MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron, 19910907000000 +0000, It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.
MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger, 20220722000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra, 19911019000000 +0000, The seventh offering from Gamera: the infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination. Joel and the Bots build a scale model of Gamera and make shoebox dioramas.

programme.title: The Slime People
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Slime People, S01E09, The crew puts Commando Cody on trial for crimes against reality after watching the sixth episode of Radar Men while slime monsters invade Los Angeles in The Slime People.
MST3K: Zombie Nightmare, 19941124000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: Warrior Of The Lost World
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior Of The Lost World, S06E01, A nameless hero and his talking motorcycle fight an evil dictator in a post-apocalyptic world.

programme.title: Gorgo
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S09E09, Greedy sailors capture a giant lizard off the coast of Ireland and sell it to a London circus. Then its mother shows up.

programme.title: Untamed Youth
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Untamed Youth, S01E12, Joel invents a pipe with a smoke detector and a sprinkler system built in for the invention exchange. The guys watch a 1950s teen flick about youths sentenced to manual labor at a cotton farm.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Days Of Our Years
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E23, Stay safe with this informative short about occupational hazards.
MST3K: Munchie, 20220527000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch as a child befriends MUNCHIE (1992). Jonah refuses to go back into the theater and suffers the consequences.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

A Wish Come True, 20150131000000 +0000, A down-on-her-luck birthday girl suddenly receives everything she ever wished for, only to realize the happy life she wanted was right in front of her all along. Stars Megan Park, Benjamin Hollingsworth and Dean Cain.

After All These Years, 20130420000000 +0000, When a woman is wrongly accused of the death of her ex-husband, she sets out to solve the murder mystery and find the real killer before the day of the funeral, when she is to be taken into custody.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E01, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail helps Sam search for the perfect engagement ring for Cassie.

programme.title: In 4/4, with Emotion
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E02, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie and Sam learn to communicate about their future together.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: Good Witch, S04E03, Hallmark Original Series. Grace is forced to think about her future.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Sam's ex-wife Linda threatens to come between them.

programme.title: Driven
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. The arrival of a man from Cassie's past may complicate her relationship.

programme.title: Out of the Past
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's old friend John attempts to unearth their shared college memories.

programme.title: The Trouble with Love
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie feels upset after Grace admits she's been spending more time with Sam.

programme.title: Surprise Me
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie is surprised with adventurous outings by both Sam and John.

programme.title: Risk
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. After a great date with Sam, Cassie feels spellbound by their connection.

programme.title: What's Your Secret?
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie begins to conjure up a surprise party for Martha and Tom.

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie works her magic to help Sam make a tough decision.

programme.title: A Perfect Match
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie considers John's adventurous job offer.

programme.title: A Perfect Match, Part 2
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie reaches a decision about her future.

programme.title: Shades Of Grey
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E18, On a mission to Tollana, O'Neill steals a weapon there and takes it back to Earth. When Hammond discovers the deception, he suspends O'Neill. But O'Neill's misconduct is only the beginning of a deep mystery that could have catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: New Ground
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E19, SG-1 journeys to a planet where their arrival ignites a war between two cultures. A spy realizes his side could win the war if SG-1 and the Stargate can be neutralized. Will O'Neill and his team make the same realization and save themselves in time?

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E20, Bra'tac (Tony Amendola) arrives at Stargate Command with a wild story about interplanetary warfare with Apophis (Peter Williams). Daniel deduces that the battle is over Apophis' child, and races to save the child before Apophis can find him first.

programme.title: Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E21, Daniel finds a crystal skull identical to one first discovered by his grandfather. When Daniel stares into the skull's eyes, a force makes him disappear. Now SG-1 must find his grandfather to unlock the mystery of the skull and bring Daniel home.

programme.title: Nemesis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E22, O'Neill is kidnapped by the Asgard and encounters a swarm of vicious metallic bug-like creatures on a mission to destroy Earth. O'Neill plans to blow up the ship and sacrifice himself, but can the team find another way to stop this apocalyptic plan?

programme.title: Small Victories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E01, SG-1 is called upon to help a race of gentle, highly-intelligent aliens struggling against a swarm of deadly mechanical spiders called Replicators. But the situation becomes much more complicated when a lone Replicator is discovered back on Earth.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E10, Sheppard and Teyla discover that a massive storm is approaching the city. The team must evacuate the city, and the Manarians offer to give them shelter. As they work to figure out a way to power up the shield, the city is invaded by the Genii.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E11, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse as he attempts to regain control of Atlantis from the Genii, who have taken the city along with Weir (Torri Higginson) and McKay (David Hewlett) hostage.

programme.title: The Defiant One
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E12, Sheppard and McKay set out, along with two scientists, to explore when they stumble upon a distress beacon coming from a Wraith ship. When they move to investigate, they discover that the ship has been sending out it's SOS signal for 10,000 years.

programme.title: Hot Zone
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E13, A team of scientists are surveying the city for damage after the storm when they unknowingly release a virus causing hallucinations and death. The virus infects McKay, Zelenka, and Ford leaving Sheppard to stop it from spreading further.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E14, While searching a new planet, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find a paradise world, Proculus, that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith. The local inhabitants, however, believe their goddess will not permit it.

programme.title: Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E15, During an exploration of the city, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find an old woman in suspended animation. Thinking her to be an Ancient, the team wakes her up, only to discover that it is Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson).

programme.title: The Brotherhood
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E16, The team searches for a valuable Zero Point Module rumored to be hidden on the planet Dagan, where the Sudarians were trusted with the module over 10,000 years ago. In their search the team begin to worry about their new allies, and their motives

programme.title: Letters From Pegasus
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E17, McKay discovers a way for the team to send messages to Earth, allowing the team to send messages to their loved ones as the Wraith approach the city. Sheppard and Teyla leave Atlantis in the hopes of gathering information about the Wraith army.

programme.title: Alliances
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E13, Greer and Wray find themselves trapped in the midst of an attack when an alien ship carrying a radioactive bomb crashes into Homeworld Command. Meanwhile, Rush (Robert Carlyle) discovers that not everyone wants Greer and Wray back aboard Destiny.

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E14, While connected to the stones in an attempt to contact Homeworld Command, Chloe wakes up with Ginn’s consciousness. Eli must find a way to protect Chloe without losing Ginn. Meanwhile, Volker requires a difficult operation to save his life.

programme.title: Seizure
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E15, Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.

programme.title: Crunch Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E016, Steve has trouble at the fraternity house and David relies on drugs to keep himself awake through finals week.

programme.title: Thicker Than Water
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E017, Kelly asks David if he is using drugs and Andrea gets surprising news from the doctor's office.

programme.title: Heartbreaker
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E018, David has his first session with a psychologist and Andrea realizes her pregnancy will affect her educational plans.

programme.title: Scared Very Straight
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E020, Jesse and Andrea set a wedding date and Donna asks David to the Valentine dance.

programme.title: Addicted to Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E021, Brenda and Stuart get stranded in the desert. Kelly helps Brandon avoid suspicion by posing as his girlfriend.

programme.title: Change Partners
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E022, Brandon and Kelly go on a weekend retreat, while Dylan and Lucinda spend time together. Brenda and Donna take in a stray dog.

programme.title: A Pig Is a Boy Is a Dog
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E023, Donna is heartbroken when Rocky dies. Brandon and Lucinda break up and Kelly tells Dylan about her moment with Brandon.

programme.title: Cuffs and Links

programme.title: Shark's Cove

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 1

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 2

programme.title: Pier Pressure

programme.title: Dead of Summer
